item.title: Why and how to get a server (and website!)
item.description: The simple steps you need to take to finally have a website.
item.content:encoded:
Why need a server?

Owning a server, or renting one, is the easiest way to host your own website online. Although GitHub, and other platform, offer ways to host your own website, they will leave you with many limitations. When you own the server, you can start hosting a lot of services! To learn more about what to do with your website, refer to this article I wrote.

How to get one

If you want to get and maintain, but don’t want to get a headache over the smallest issues, I cannot recommend Luke Smith’s website any stronger. Stop being an internet peasant, and become an internet landlord!
